channel.title: [IMPLEMENTED] List of Forum News (right corner)
channel.description:
[u][b]Update:[/b][/u]
To get to the list, you can skip right to my last post: https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,240.msg2046.html#msg2046
[u]Original Post:[/u]
Bored? Want to chat with other Whonix users? Join us in [url=http://irc://irc.oftc.net/whonix]IRC[/url] chat ([url=https://webirc.oftc.net:8443/?channels=Whonix]Webchat[/url]).
Don't mind having your name connected to Whonix? Follow us. [url=https://twitter.com/Whonix]Twitter[/url] / [url=https://www.facebook.com/Whonix]Facebook[/url] / [url=https://plus.google.com/108150429836421683225]g+[/url]
Check out [url=https://www.whonix.org]Whonix blog[/url].
Did you know that anyone can edit [url=https://www.whonix.org]Whonix's wiki[/url]?
Want to make Whonix more safe and usable? We're looking for helping hands. Check out [url=https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues]Github Issues[/url] and [url=https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/board,5.0.html]development forum[/url].
Please consider a [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate]recurring donation[/url]!
Want to get involved with Whonix? Check out our [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute]Contribute[/url] page.
Did you know you can [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Forcing_.onion_on_Whonix.org]enforce using an alternative .onion domain[/url] to access this website?
Did you know, that Whonix has some protection against [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Backdoor_(computing)]backdoors[/url]? The [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Verifiable_Builds]Verifiable Builds[/url] feature only adds security if people like you actually use it!
Do you know our [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Documentation]Documentation[/url], [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Design]Technical Design[/url] and [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Developer_Portal]Developer Portal[/url] already?
There are [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/git#subscribe_to_code_changes]5 different options[/url] to subscribe to Whonix source code changes?
Join us testing new [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/AppArmor]AppArmor profiles[/url] for improved security! ([url=https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,97.0.html]forum discussion[/url])
Brainstorming: [url=https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,215.0.html]Where Whonix wants to be in 2 or 5 years?[/url]
Interested in becoming author for [url=https://www.whonix.org/blog]Whonix blog[/url]? Writing about anonymity/privacy/security? Get in touch!
Wondering why Whonix will always be Free? Check out [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Why_Whonix_is_Free_Software]Why Whonix is Free Software[/url].
It would be great if you could create a Wikipedia page for Whonix (it's own article, not a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Whonix#Whonix_.28Anonymous_Operating_System.29]redirection[/url] to another page).
Did you [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute]contribiute[/url] to Whonix? Feel free to add your name and what you did to the [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Authorship]Whonix Authorship[/url] page.
Please [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute]contribute[/url] by [url=http://https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute#Answer_Questions]answering questions[/url].

item.title: [IMPLEMENTED] List of Forum News (right corner)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Since the random news have been implemented in Whonix’s wiki as well, the list is now online, available to be seen for anyone:
https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=Template:RandomNews&action=edit

I manually keep it in sync with the forum.

Feel free to suggest new random news by editing the wiki page.

Read full topic

item.title: [IMPLEMENTED] List of Forum News (right corner)
item.dc:creator: Occq
item.description:
Just a preference since the senteces are flowing in midair. I’m actually fine either way.

Read full topic

item.title: [IMPLEMENTED] List of Forum News (right corner)
item.dc:creator: Occq
item.description:
My idea of more concise news. These are still pretty generic. Is quirky (like ImgGur’s “we are easy to stalk” with links to FB) encouraged?

Patrick:

Bored? Want to chat with other Whonix users? Join us in IRC chat (Webchat).

Check out [url=https://www.whonix.org]Whonix blog[/url].
Want to make Whonix more safe and usable? We're looking for helping hands. Check out [url=https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues]Github Issues[/url] and [url=https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/board,5.0.html]development forum[/url].
Please consider a [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate]recurring donation[/url]!
Want to get involved with Whonix? Check out our [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute]Contribute[/url] page.
There are [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/git#subscribe_to_code_changes]5 different options[/url] to subscribe to Whonix source code changes
Brainstorming: [url=https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,215.0.html]Where do you want for Whonix to be in 2 or 5 years[/url]
Interested in becoming author for [url=https://www.whonix.org/blog]Whonix blog[/url]? Writing about anonymity/privacy/security? Get in touch!
Wondering why Whonix will always be Free? Check out [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Why_Whonix_is_Free_Software]Why Whonix is Free Software[/url].
It would be great if you could create a Wikipedia page for Whonix (it's own article, not a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Whonix#Whonix_.28Anonymous_Operating_System.29]redirection[/url] to another page).
Did you [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute]contribiute[/url] to Whonix? Feel free to add your name and what you did to the [url=https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Authorship]Whonix Authorship[/url] page.

Read full topic

item.title: [IMPLEMENTED] List of Forum News (right corner)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Update:

To get to the list, you can skip right to my last post:
https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,240.msg2046.html#msg2046

Original Post:

Bored? Want to chat with other Whonix users? Join us in IRC chat (Webchat).

Don’t mind having your name connected to Whonix? Follow us. Twitter / Facebook / g+

Check out Whonix blog.

Did you know that anyone can edit Whonix’s wiki?

Want to make Whonix more safe and usable? We’re looking for helping hands. Check out Github Issues and development forum.

Please consider a recurring donation!

Want to get involved with Whonix? Check out our Contribute page.

Did you know you can enforce using an alternative .onion domain to access this website?

Did you know, that Whonix has some protection against backdoors? The Verifiable Builds feature only adds security if people like you actually use it!

Do you know our Documentation, Technical Design and Developer Portal already?

There are 5 different options to subscribe to Whonix source code changes?

Join us testing new AppArmor profiles for improved security! (forum discussion)

Brainstorming: Where Whonix wants to be in 2 or 5 years?

Interested in becoming author for Whonix blog? Writing about anonymity/privacy/security? Get in touch!

Wondering why Whonix will always be Free? Check out Why Whonix is Free Software.

It would be great if you could create a Wikipedia page for Whonix (it’s own article, not a redirection to another page).

Did you contribiute to Whonix? Feel free to add your name and what you did to the Whonix Authorship page.

Please contribute by answering questions.

Read full topic
